msg.confirm-close: The changes you made will be lost if you close this form.
msg.confirm-changeType: The changes you made will be lost if you change the content type.
msg.confirm-navigate: The changes you made will be lost if you navigate away from this page.

msg.wrong-mimetype: Mime type {0} is not allowed for field {1}. Please upload another file

msg.can-not-remove-locked-node: Node {0} is locked. You cannot move it to the Trash.
msg.can-not-remove-checked-in-node: Node {0} or its parent is checked in. You cannot move it to the Trash.
msg.access-denied-to-delete: Access denied. You cannot move node {0} to the Trash.

msg.unknown-error: An error occurred while editing this property.

msg.node-is-locked: This node is locked. You cannot watch it.
msg.unknown-error: Some errors have occurred. You cannot watch this node.

label.InvalidCharacters: Invalid characters will be changed by '-'
label.DropFileMessage: Drop your files here in the current folder
label.MaxFileSizeAlert: The file size exceeds the size limit of
label.AbortAllConfirmation: Do you want to abort all files in progress?

msg.property-name-incorrect: The property name is incorrect, please enter another value for it!

VersionException.msg: Cannot modify documents that are being checked in.
